short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically signs you in with KTH.se.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension automatically signs you in with KTH.se every time you open your Chrome browser. Just specify your username (@kth.se) and your password in the settings, restart Chrome and you'll be automatically signed in with KTH.se.

Privacy policy: All credentials are stored locally and will only leave your device when they are sent to KTH.se.
